battlecode.common

Enum RobotMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RobotMode>
      • battlecode.common.RobotMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RobotMode>

    public enum RobotMode
extends java.lang.Enum<RobotMode>
    Enumerates the modes that a robot could possibly be in. The mode of a robot determines the set of interactions with the world that it can currently perform legally.

    You can check the mode of another robot by inspecting RobotInfo.mode, or your own mode by inspecting RobotController.getMode().

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DROID
      The Droid mode describes all Droid robots.
      PORTABLE
      The Portable mode describes Buildings in Portable mode.
      PROTOTYPE
      The Prototype mode describes newly-constructed Buildings.
      TURRET
      The Turret mode describes Buildings in Turret mode.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean canAct
      Whether robots in this mode may perform actions other than moving.
      boolean canMove
      Whether robots in this mode may move.
      boolean canTransform
      Whether robots in this mode may transform to another mode.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • DROID

        public static final RobotMode DROID
        The Droid mode describes all Droid robots. These robots can always act and move, as long as their cooldowns permit.

      • PROTOTYPE

        public static final RobotMode PROTOTYPE
        The Prototype mode describes newly-constructed Buildings. These robots cannot do anything until they have been repaired to full health by a Builder.

      • TURRET

        public static final RobotMode TURRET
        The Turret mode describes Buildings in Turret mode. These robots can act, but not move. Turrets can also transform into Portable mode.

      • PORTABLE

        public static final RobotMode PORTABLE
        The Portable mode describes Buildings in Portable mode. These robots can move, but not act. Portables can also transform into Turret mode.

    • Field Detail

      • canAct

        Whether robots in this mode may perform actions other than moving.

      • canMove

        public final boolean canMove
        Whether robots in this mode may move.

      • canTransform

        public final boolean canTransform
        Whether robots in this mode may transform to another mode.
